Original:
🗳台北公館 ¦ 捷運 #公館 站
🚶🏻‍♀️1號出口約步行4分鐘

【澗面小酒館 Bar & Bistro】🍸

位於公館二樓新開的神秘Bistro，初訪就被濃濃的中式復古風格和漂亮的小陽台窗景打中，很適合和朋友暢聊小酌，整體風格和氣氛很舒適，前陣子平日晚間打烊前前往用餐體驗非常好～

這一趟和朋友一致認同最喜歡的餐食是剝皮辣椒豬肉水餃，好吃到吃不夠再點一盤的那種🥟🥢，另外是剛起鍋熱乎乎的松露薯條和各個風味的酒都很搭、同樣推薦必點！

老闆們非常客氣親切，離開前喝到了老闆們請的shot，口感很溫厚順口、不會太烈，不太能喝酒的我很印象深刻、超級喜歡🙌🏻💫

調酒的部分體感上對我們來說酒感比較重，如果和我們一樣喜歡喝很妹很妹的酒的人，建議可以詢問老闆們專業的意見去做參考和降酒調整哦！

⇣往下看我點了什麼⇣

Original:
位在公館地區新開的bar，位於原本蕭家乾麵的二樓位置，在公館夜市中提供了一個鬧中取靜的優雅角落，2樓的視野非常棒，可以看到夜市的熱鬧景色。

跟老板交流發現這家店是捷運忠孝新生站知名酒吧“離騷"的姐妹店，且還有專屬本店的獨特酒單， 種類非常多元，且品項充滿許多驚喜。

本次我點了芭樂口味的調酒，讓人驚艷且爽口， 朋友點了當日的特調也非常的滿意。此外店內提供的麵食還有炸物，也都令人驚訝的優秀。

在大學區能有這樣傑出且價位實惠的bar好店，真的非常難得，適合好友下班後相約聚會，期待繼續造訪來體驗其他的精彩酒單跟美食。
EN:
The newly opened BAR in the Mansion area is located on the second floor of the original Xiaojianan noodle. It provides a quiet and elegant corner in the night market in the Mansion. The vision on the second floor is very good. You can see the lively scenery of the night market.

Communicated with the boss and found that this shop is a sisters 'sisters' shop "Li Sao", a well -known bar of MRT Zhongxiao Xinsheng Station, and the unique wine list of exclusive shops. The types are very diverse, and the items are full of many surprises.

This time, I ordered Berlie -flavored bartending, which was amazing and refreshing. My friend ordered the special adjustment that day was very satisfied.In addition, the pasta provided in the store also has fried objects, which are also surprising.

It is really rare to have such an outstanding and affordable BAR store in the university district. It is really rare. It is suitable for friends to meet with friends after get off work. I look forward to continuing to experience other wonderful wine lists and food.

Original:
偶然抬頭，瞥見了這家名為「澗面」的酒館，彷彿是命運的指引。踏進店內，濃濃的古典懷舊風撲面而來，讓人仿佛瞬間穿越回1920年代的上海。最特別的是，店裡竟然設有月老求籤，為整個體驗增添了幾分神秘色彩。店員非常友善，細心地教導求籤過程，讓人倍感賓至如歸。

而這裡的茶酒，真是讓我大開眼界，完全顛覆了我對茶酒的固有認知。當我與佳人共飲時，她那明眸皓齒在燈光下更顯動人，一抹微笑更是迷倒眾生。每一口調酒，都讓她的美麗更添一層韻味，她不禁驚喜地讚嘆出聲，笑容如春風般輕拂，令周圍的氣氛更顯溫馨。她那宛如秋水般的眼神，閃爍著對這茶酒的讚賞，讓我深感與她共飲此美酒是何等幸運。

世間美酒佳人皆難求，而此刻佳人在側，美酒在手，二者齊聚於此，夫復何求？
EN:
Occasionally looked up and glanced at the tavern called "Noodles", as if it was the guidance of fate.Stepping into the store, the thick classical nostalgic wind came from, making people seem to cross the 1920s in Shanghai in the 1920s.The most special thing is that the store has a monthly old promise, adding a bit of mystery to the entire experience.The clerk is very friendly, and teaches the process of signing carefully, making people feel at home.

And the tea wine here really made me open my eyes, completely subverting my inherent understanding of tea wine.When I drank with the beautiful woman, her eyes were even more moving in the light, and a smile was fascinated by the sentient beings.Each bartender made her beauty add a layer of charm. She couldn't help but surprise and admired her. The smile was as light as the spring breeze, making the atmosphere around her more warm.Her eyes like autumn water flashed with appreciation of the tea and wine, making me feel so lucky to drink this wine with her.

It is difficult to find the beauty of wine in the world, and at this moment, the beautiful women are on the side, the wine is in hand, and the two are gathered here.

Original:
隱藏在台北公館水源市場的本面酒館酒吧雖然開業僅兩個月，但已成為當地人的最愛。到了晚上7點，餐廳內的氣氛還算平靜，但到了晚上10點之後，氣氛突然變得熱鬧起來，訂位常常爆滿。

一踏入滿面酒廠，立刻感受到迪化街的寧靜，這是清末第一條迪化街，與市井的喧囂形成鮮明對比。店門口有一座月下老人的神聖雕像，是特意從台南大天后宮請來的，據店主介紹，這個月下老人據說有一種非常靈力的力量。自開業以來，不少男女前來祈求相親，據說能幸運地找到另一半。如果你想找對象，可以一心向月下老人請教，得到他的許可，就可以抽籤了。這個神簽以準確預測未來命運而聞名。

「讚面酒廠」的設計和氛圍是根據算命先生的建議而創造的，而「讚面酒廠」的名字是由算命先生建議將「讚」這個名字命名為「讚」的。意味著清澈的山澗已經完成了。二樓的酒吧區俯瞰汀州街的繁華，有時讓人感覺彷彿置身於上海租界區。也許像高橋一政這樣的間諜會從窗外窺視並執行秘密任務。

千萬不要錯過三面酒館的美食。特別推薦的是燉菜拼盤。脆脆的醃瓜的加入，在不失傳統風味的情況下，增添了清爽感。這項創新創造了老式風味和新鮮度的完美平衡。更重要的是，這裡的湯包和牛肉麵也很美味，是週末晚上坐下來享用，或是與朋友聚會度過美好時光的絕佳場所。

甘棉酒廠以其獨特的氛圍和高品質的美食，在繁華的公館地區確立了獨特的地位。無論您是祈求姻緣，還是享受美味佳餚，這裡都能滿足您的願望。 Sammian Distillery 提供的不僅是酒吧文化，更是傳統與現代、東方與西方完美結合的特殊體驗。
EN:
Although the tavern bar hidden in the Taipei Mansion Waterfall market has opened for only two months, it has become the favorite of locals.At 7 o'clock in the evening, the atmosphere in the restaurant was calm, but after 10 pm, the atmosphere suddenly became lively, and the reservation was often full.

As soon as I stepped into the full -faced winery, I immediately felt the tranquility of Dihua Street. This was the first Dihua Street in the late Qing Dynasty, which was in sharp contrast to the hustle and bustle of the market.There is a sacred statue of the old man under the shop, which is specially invited from the Datian Harem of Tainan. According to the owner, the old man is said to have a very spiritual power this month.Since the opening, many men and women have come to pray for a blind date, and are said to be lucky to find the other half.If you want to find an object, you can ask the old man in the moon and get his permission to draw.This god's visa is famous for accurate forecasting future fate.

The design and atmosphere of "Zan Noodle Winery" was created according to the suggestions of the fortune teller, and the name of the "Zan Noodle Winery" was named "Zan" the name "Zan" by the fortune teller.It means that the clear mountain stream has been completed.The bar area on the second floor overlooks the prosperity of Tingzhou Street, and sometimes it feels like being in the Shanghai Concession.Perhaps a espionage like Takahashi Yizheng peek out of the window and perform secret tasks.

Don't miss the food of the three -sided tavern.Special recommendation is stewing platter.The addition of crispy pickles adds a refreshing feeling without the traditional flavor.This innovation created the perfect balance of the old -fashioned flavor and freshness.More importantly, the soup and beef noodles here are also delicious. It is a great place to sit down on weekends and enjoy a good time with friends.

With its unique atmosphere and high -quality cuisine, the Gannian Winery established a unique position in the prosperous mansion area.Whether you pray for marriage or enjoy delicious food, you can satisfy your wishes here.Sammian Distillery provides not only bar culture, but also a special experience that is perfectly combined with modern, Oriental, and West.

Original: 非常好酒店，讓我玻璃杯震撼
EN: Very good hotel, let me have a glass of glass
